turns.answer:
MOBAs are a great way to use your social deduction rules. You do not need to understand the rules to understand how to use them.

Question: What is the social deduction rule? Answer: You can use any social deduction
turns.label: unknown

turns.answer: I was at the end of a drive, I saw the car. I was standing next to it and thought. This car was very small. The driver was about the same height as me. I didn't even know what it was.
